createStake(uint256,uint8,uint64).notice: A method for a staker to create a stake

createStakeWithETH(uint8,uint64).notice: allows to create stake directly with ETH if you don't have GRISE tokens method will convert and use amount returned from UNISWAP to open a stake

endStake(bytes16).notice: A method for a staker to remove a stake belonging to his address by providing ID of a stake.

manualDailySnapshot().notice: allows volunteer to offload snapshots to save on gas during next start/end stake

manualDailySnapshotPoint(uint256).notice: allows volunteer to offload snapshots to save on gas during next start/end stake in case manualDailySnapshot reach block limit

scrapeReward(bytes16).notice: alloes to scrape Reward from active stake
